notesStmt.note: Chapters end with סליק פירקא in enlarged squared characters; Begins from middle of chapter 6 מן הצד - 10 איסי בן יהודה(!) אומ; text is divided into unnumbered chapters.
Condition: nearly complete; losses in lower interior corner.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msContents.textLang: Hebrew; Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE)

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 27; ruling method: left rule justified by stretching last character.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
